articles.author: Chris Cotillo | ccotillo@MassLive.com
articles.title: Pete Alonso, top Red Sox free agent target, signs $155M deal with AL East rival instead - MassLive.com
articles.description: All winter, slugger Pete Alonso seemed like a perfect fit to join the Red Sox lineup. Instead, he’s joining a motivated American League East rival on a big contract.
articles.content:
ORLANDO, Fla. All winter, slugger Pete Alonso seemed like a perfect fit to join the Red Sox lineup. Instead, hes joining a motivated American League East rival on a big contract.
